turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to place an order with a restaurant pizzeria called Bella Luna for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two medium pizzas. One with onion and the other with sausage and pepperoni. And they both need to be extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Bella Luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas with extra cheese, 1 onion and 1 sausage pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total will be $40, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick that up. And how long is it going to take for it to be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. I appreciate your help.
